agent_utterance: Today’s ultra-simple move: when you notice an urge, pause for 2 minutes to check your hunger, then choose one small, pre-portioned option (for example, a small apple, about a handful of nuts, or a glass of water) and carry on with your routine. If you’re not hungry after the pause, you can skip the snack. A quick log (one line) of what you chose can help you see patterns without adding effort.
agent_monologue: High-structure, low-effort approach: on tense days you benefit from a tiny, repeatable behavioral anchor that reduces impulsive snacking and builds tolerance for waiting. This leverages your preference for routine and addresses evening cues by offering a small, pre-planned option.
